description:
The Dancouga Nova is basically the unit developed for the Dancouga Nova Project. The Dancouga Nova is a combination of four separate machines, which are the Nova Eagle, Nova Rhino, Nova Liger, and the Nova Elephant. In which each of these mecha have three different transformations; Humanoid, Beast, and Vehicle types. Dancouga Nova`s Weaponry include the (Slash/Sever Space Sword), an atomic-vibration blade and the Dancouga Nova`s default weapon, the (Slash/Sever Space Cannon), which is an array of cannons that can be fired all at once and the Boost Nova Knuckle, which Dancouga Nova launches its right arm. The unit can only be piloted by Aoi through a direct motion tracing system.
Source: Wiki
name: Dancouga Nova
